actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the autonomy of the Kurdish Nation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States Government, the United Nations, and other governments use their moral influence and good offices for the right of autonomy within the framework of the Kurdish nation in Iraq, including the fair and equitable division of oil and other natural resources within the area.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the autonomy of the Kurdish Nation.
